Author: Bryan_Beus#6442
Content:
In short: NXT tried to bottleneck the developers, and JL and company left to start KMD, so that it wouldn't happen again. 

BTCD: A project JL and a few others (ca ?) were involved in, and when they left, they kept their commitment to those folk by giving a swap opportunity.

ARDR: Nothing much in common. ARDR, I believe, is the next iteration of NXT.
